serviceDescription: Execute code modifications and manage AI coding sessions via OpenCode API deployed on Fly.io

opencodeCreateSession.description: Create a new OpenCode sandbox session for AI-assisted code modifications

opencodeSendPrompt.description: Send a prompt/instruction to an OpenCode session for code modifications

opencodeGetMessages.description: Get all messages from an OpenCode session to see the conversation history and AI responses

opencodeGetSession.description: Get details about a specific OpenCode session including stats and title
